Context:
The George Brown College Student Life Volunteer Squad (SLVS) is a program open to all full-time George Brown College students. Participants will develop human skills and clarify career goals while volunteering and being an active member of the college and global communities. The Volunteer Program consists of three journeys, with specific outcomes listed below:

3. After completing Journey 3, students will be able to: [specific abilities or knowledge gained]

To register for the Student Life Volunteer Squad and receive volunteer and job opportunities, as well as social events, complete an online form and agree to occasional emails. For inquiries, contact Davor Mamuzic at dmamuzic@georgebrown.ca. The registration process also includes agreeing to receive updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more.
